message.body: Hey. Just out of curiosity, are you going back to school from New York/new jersey or are you coming home first?
I'm home, I was gonna text you at 4 to see if you were out of class
Oh cool. I'm outta class, but I have class at 4 until 7. Are you for tonight something tonight?
Ohh okay. I misremembered your schedule
Excellent!
Yayyy!!!
Sounds great
Hey! You out of class?
Yup! Just got home.
So. I forgot I said I'd go with a friend from class to a drag show at machine to night.
Any interest in stopping by for a little bit?
If not, we can do something else. Watch a movie, eat food, the usual
Like before you go out? Eating food is always good
I told Anna I'd Skype later anyway at like 10ish
Sure
Around 1030
Lovely!
Okay...should I come over then?
Slash what time are you meeting up with your friend?
Oh ok
Alright see you soon!
Actually, I'm gonna jump in the shower. you wanna plan to be here closer to 8?
Cool
Sure
Have you seen 5 year engagement?
Nope
It's ducking hilarious
And by ducking, I do mean fucking
Hahahahahaha
So. We should watch the rest of it/ start over tonight. If you're interested?
I am talking to someone who works at penn at 9 and I already ate. I could come over after...how long is it?
It's two hrs. We can watch it another night
Or we could start it
It's up to you. I'm gonna jump in the shower now and then watch it. So come over now, later, whenever, never. You know, the usual
So...I will probs be over sometime between 9:30 and 10:15
Sounds good
Goooooood
Bruce Almighty?
Yeah
Bah so 40 minutes ago his guy said he would call me back in 20min...
*this
Ah. That's obnoxious. What is this for?
Can I assume I won't be graced with your presence tonight?
Ermahgerd. Just got off the phone. I could come over...how much later are you staying up?
I probably gonna go to sleep soon actually. I have to be up early tmrw.
Ok. See you tomorrow then?
Sure
Snow day!
:) it's so pretty out ❄
Yayyyyyy!
Yes it is
Yes and no. I'm at home all day chilling....and working on hw.
You're welcomed to come over and hangout/ watch movies etc.
Hahaha perfect.
Haha I was gonna ask if I can do that thing where I come camp out and bring my reading and my knitting and complain about my reading and you make me watch a movie
Ok I'm actually coming over now
Haha well that's earlier than I predicted
Hey do you have something planned tonight? Wanna go out?
Nope today's my last day :)!
Wait...do you not have class tomorrow?
Oh! Awesome!
Excellent. I was thinking we could drink some wine and maybe hang in Boston(or JP if Sydney joins). Find a place to play some pool.
Great! I'll text you when I'm out of class tonight, Around 630ish and we can make a plan-thing
Okay
McKay
Nope
Mmkay
Grrrrreat!
I'm outta class!
Congrats!!!
Also I might have to do some stuff with my mom before we go out...ugh I am not happy
Gracias! That's cool. I still have 4 question left to do anyway v
Ick
Yeah :/ but I'm in a groove so hopefully I get it done soon!

So options for tonight: 1. Go to Sydney's place, drink wine*, hangout 1a. Play pool at bar 1b. Go to queeroke (queer karaoke) at midway cafe/bar 1c. Leave after hanging out for a bit 2. Hangout at my house (w/harsha), drink wine*, watch a movie, play games *wine-drinking not required
Oh! option 3: go into Boston, walk around, get hot chocolate 3a. Go to estate (bar/club)
I'd be down for going to Jp if you want to, but either way!
Don't say it's up to you!
Honestly any of them. I'm a little tired so I don't want to do like three things.
Ill narrow it down
1a, 1b, or 1c (a and b if we feel up to it I suppose but I'm not terribly awake) OR 3
I'm more in the mood for car than club
Okay. Sydney's it is and then we can figure out whether to go to play pool, or karaoke or leave as we feel more or less tires?
*tired
Yes sounds good. I need to finish up eating and change. Are you driving?
If you'd rather not drive, I can drive. If you don't care, then could you drive?
I can drive if you can direct
Also I'm not gonna drink barely at all cause my tolerance right now is -5
Cool, yes i can direct. And that's fine. You don't have to drink; I'm not planning on this being a get belligerent kinda night
Excellent
I'll be ready in 10mins.
Ok I need to swing by the ATM also
No. That's where I draw the line.
Fuuuuuuuck
Our frieeeennnndddsshhiiiipppppppp
Nnnnoooooooooo
And that's the way the cookie crumbles.
Ouch. I'm here. Also is this a see-how-many-times-you-can-quote-Bruce-almighty game?
I'm gonna need a minute. You can come In if you want

Hey. I just want you to know that I appreciate you. I know you don't "tolerate me" and I wast drunk tonight but you always have been and still are one of the few people, alive anyway, who I can always be myself around and it is as important to me today in light of Charlie and Marco's death as it was when we became good friends when I came out. Anyway, you always brush it off as, oh it's no big deal. But it's rare and special to me, as you are you rare and special to me. I hope that I'll be able to say this to you for many year to come. Love you?
*love you. No question mark :)
Haha I was gonna say
Tqm también, esposita
Ah. Just saw this. 6 is gonna be a little too early for me; I'm still finishing up my final exam for my class. I can text when I'm done and meet up with you both if you want to eat now.
It's gonna be at least another hour
Timing?
Let me finish up this question and I'll take a break for a bit and come over.
K we are finishing up the food now
Here
